briefdescription.para: sets the GCLK enable bit in the SPI register to a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The value of the GCLK enable bit

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: writes a byte of data to the TXDATA register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The data to be written to the TXDATA register

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: reads a byte of data from the RXDATA register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The data read from the RXDATA register

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: sets the clock polarity of the SPI in the CFG register to a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The clock polarity value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: sets the clock phase of the SPI in the CFG register to a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The clock phase value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: reads the TX FIFO empty flag from the STATUS register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The TX FIFO empty flag value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: reads the RX FIFO empty flag from the STATUS register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The RX FIFO empty flag value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: waits for the TX FIFO to be empty by polling the TX FIFO empty flag in the STATUS register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: waits for the RX FIFO to be not empty by polling the RX FIFO empty flag in the STATUS register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: flushes the RX FIFO by writing to the RX FIFO FLUSH register

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: enables the SPI by setting the enable bit in the CTRL register to 1, enables spi master pulse generation

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: disables the SPI by setting the enable bit in the CTRL register to 0, disables spi master pulse generation

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: enables the RX by setting the RX enable bit in the CTRL register to 1, enables storing bytes recieved from slave in RX FIFO

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: disables the RX by setting the RX enable bit in the CTRL register to 0, disables storing bytes recieved from slave in RX FIFO

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: asserts the CS line by setting the SS bit in the CTRL register to 1, asserts the CS line to start a transaction with the slave

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: deasserts the CS line by setting the SS bit in the CTRL register to 0, deasserts the CS line to end a transaction with the slave

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
sets the value of the Interrupts Masking Register; which enable and disables interrupts The mask value is a 6-bit value, where each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 TXF : Transmit FIFO is Full.
bit 2 RXE : Receive FIFO is Empty.
bit 3 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 4 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 5 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
gets the value of the Interrupts Masking Register; which enable and disables interrupts The mask value is a 6-bit value, where each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 TXF : Transmit FIFO is Full.
bit 2 RXE : Receive FIFO is Empty.
bit 3 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 4 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 5 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
gets the value of the Raw Interrupt Status Register; which shows the status of the interrupts The mask value is a 6-bit value, where each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 TXF : Transmit FIFO is Full.
bit 2 RXE : Receive FIFO is Empty.
bit 3 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 4 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 5 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
gets the value of the Masked Interrupt Status Register; which shows the status of the interrupts after masking (ANDing) RIS by IM. The mask value is a 6-bit value, where each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 TXF : Transmit FIFO is Full.
bit 2 RXE : Receive FIFO is Empty.
bit 3 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 4 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 5 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
sets the value of the Interrupt Clear Register; which clears the interrupts The mask value is a 6-bit value, where each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt
bit 0 TXE : Transmit FIFO is Empty.
bit 1 TXF : Transmit FIFO is Full.
bit 2 RXE : Receive FIFO is Empty.
bit 3 RXF : Receive FIFO is Full.
bit 4 TXB : Transmit FIFO level is Below Threshold.
bit 5 RXA : Receive FIFO level is Above Threshold.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_SPI_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of SPI registers. EF_SPI_TYPE is a structure that contains the SPI registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: C header file for SPI APIs which contains the function prototypes.
